name: Unknown
shortDescription: Begin without an existing story. You are unknown to the Sector at large, free to shape your own future.
longDescription: No predefined background. Begin with your selected faction without any additional changes.

name: Heavy Debt
shortDescription: Lingering debt from your previous life still follows you. You hope to escape it someday.
longDescription: Indebted to a famous pirate captain, you are unlikely to ever meet their increasingly insane demands for repayment. Every month, a level-dependent number of credits will be subtracted from your coffers. Replaces "Spacer obligation" if enabled.
